title: Online Learning Modules for Materials Science Concept Adaptation

context.additional_context: Asynchronous online course for adult learners who work and require flexible study hours

learning_goals: Learners can explain core materials science concepts (crystal structures, phase transitions, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can autonomously select concept modules tailored to their individual learning levels using an adaptive system.
Learners can diagnose their conceptual understanding through formative assessments and address gaps within two weeks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
